definition: earth/dust/clay/local/indigenous/crude opium/unsophisticated/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
France/French/abbr. for 法國|法国[Fa3 guo2]/Taiwan pr. [Fa4]
law/method/way/to emulate/(Buddhism) dharma/(abbr. for 法家[Fa3 jia1]) the Legalists/(physics) farad (abbr. for 法拉[fa3 la1])

sentences.english: The tailing may be used as raw material to smelt zinc oxide by indigenous methods.
sentences.chinese: 尾礦可作爲土法冶煉氧化鋅的原料。

sentences.english: Hu is the use of indigenous or sesame oil produced from oil press .
sentences.chinese: 胡麻油就是採用土法或榨油機生產出的食用油。

sentences.english: The State shall adopt measures to ban coke making by indigenous methods.
sentences.chinese: 國家採取措施取締土法煉焦。

definition: to draw on local resources/using materials at hand
to extract oil from vegetables/to press
a blast furnace (in modern times)/a draft assisted furnace for smelting metals
